response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your specific needs. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, it's valued at $12,000 by many. I am willing to extend this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $11,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant savings compared to the market value. Don't miss out on this chance to experience the unparalleled benefits of our product.
